notes.text:
This update for gmp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-43618: Fixed buffer overflow via crafted input in mpz/inp_raw.c (bsc#1192717).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: GNU Multiple Precision Arithmetic Library (GMP) through 6.2.1 has an mpz/inp_raw.c integer overflow and resultant buffer overflow via crafted input, leading to a segmentation fault on 32-bit platforms.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
